name: Petz: My Baby Hamster
overview: Raise and care for your very own baby hamster, and nurture and play with one of the cutest and sweetest pets ever to build an everlasting friendship. In Petz: My Baby Hamster you can raise and care for your very own baby hamster, allowing you to nurture and play with one of the cutest and sweetest pets ever to build an everlasting friendship. Players adopt and care for their very own baby hamster and watch its personality develop. You can customize it by choosing your favorite type and color of fur coat from hundreds of different options. Their individual personalities will affect gameplay, such as the food types that they like and dislike. The better you care for your hamster, the better friends you two will become! It doesn't stop there, however. You can keep your hamster entertained and watch them do funny activities, as well as watch your hamster evolving in their own environment and playing in their wheel. When ready, your hamster's motivation level will increase and you will be able to enter them in all kinds of fun and competitive events. My Baby Hamster has realistic high-quality graphics that take advantage of the PSP technology Hamsters look and behave more realistically than ever, with improved motions and behavior due to PSP technology. You can watch your hamster interact with realistic environments, whether it's your room or their own customized cage. Use the TV option on your PSP to observe and interact with different hamsters. Each channel corresponds to a different TV show where hamsters are doing different activities, with channels differing depending on the time of day that you turn your TV on! At any time you can jump into the TV to get hands-on and interact with the hamster of your choice!
